subject: Football
Poetry and Poets
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The poet Lawrence Ferlinghetti had given up watching football, in favor of baseball and soccer, until he stumbled on the fantastic finish of the 49ers-Saints playoff game last week.
snippet: The poet Lawrence Ferlinghetti had given up watching football, in favor of baseball and soccer, until he stumbled on the fantastic finish of the 49ers-Saints playoff game last week.
